title: 1938년 Kohli 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Kohli. 판결일: 1938-05-02. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Julia V. Kohli v. Walter J. Kohli
**판결일**: 1938-05-02
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 254 A.D. 741

## 판결문 요약


Action to annul a marriage on the ground of fraud. Judgment dismissing the complaint unanimously affirmed, without costs. No opinion. Present — Lazansky, P. J., Hagarty, Carswell, Adel and Close, JJ.
...
